html: 8.19.18  10:28 pm   I feel like I'm bad at giving advice to me friends. How do I give good advice?

8.19.18  10:11 pm   have you ever experienced something like having your emotions shut off?

      i am getting very frustrated because i love(d?) music and art and life so much but now all my favorite songs feel empty.

      all i get out of them are vague recollections about what they were supposed to have made me feel, rather than the actual feelings themselves.

      this is making me feel disgusted and it is making me feel a great sense of loss because i wanted to be a musician and i guess i still want to be but i can't feel anything positive. when i play something i can't tell if it's good or not because i can't tell if i'm creating the feeling i want or not because i can't feel the feelings. am i going to spend the rest of my life without feeling the joy of music ever again?

     i really don't want this to happen to me. what if i'm doomed to be like this forever.

     i can feel boredom, loneliness, and crushing hopelessness, and that's pretty much it. maybe i'm depressed. am i depressed?

     i can sort of feel amused but that's not the same thing as like real joy and happiness. i really miss the feeling of awe.i used to look at the sky and the clouds and the stars and feel so much awe. why are my feelings so broken. it's like everything i cared about is now so far away.
it seems like you like to suggest walking for dealing with crappy feelings, and that indeed used to be my go to method as well, but even walking feels empty. what can i do? i'm sad.

     also am i being overly dramatic?

      i hate being that one person who can't deal with their shit as well as most other people and then goes off and complains about how bad their life is. but i really don't know what to do.

      thanks for reading bill.

8.19.18  6:25 pm   Hey bill. I'd love to take a walk. But I can't. My parents would punish me if I tried to. They never let me leave the house alone.

      I'm upset of that because I feel like I really need to just get away from all of the things that depress me. Because to tell you the truth, I don't want to be here anymore. It makes me terribly sad that I can't do anything about my current situation. Because I'm just a teenager that can't even be trusted with making my own decisions. I'm sad because I don't want to be here anymore with my family- I want to be alone and just express myself freely. I really just want to die.

     I can't wait till I'm an adult to just leave. I can't. But if I decide to just get away from everything, then I'll get punished. I'm so scared and angry that I can't even do a simple thing that you reccomened to me- to just take a walk. Fuck! Last time I decided to take a walk.... let's just say it was a terrible between my parents  and I. I can't be myself. And that upsets me and makes me miserable. I'm sorry I'm just so upset and it seems like there's nothing I can do to help myself. I don't want to be here anymore. I wish I didn't exist so that I didn't suffer through so much bullshit.

8.19.18  12:32 pm   I'm just going to talk about how I feel when I try to express myself through art and how I struggle sometimes. So haha this is going to be stupid. But I stare at a blank piece of paper and then my mind just goes blank and then I'm like "how the fuck am I supposed to express my feelings through a pencil? Do I create a new character?"

      And then I freeze up and my mind freaks out like this: jdgdhsjshshsjsj and I stop at the idea of a character and I'm like ahhhhh.

     And now I realize how stupid I've been. I should just doodle and not give a fuck about what happens. Just express it- even if it isn't clear. And I've been so scared to do something wrong because I want to be so much like the other people I look up to that are able to create cool stuff. But if I look at how I'm feeling at the moment, It doesn't even feel right to make "cool stuff" it feels right to express my anger and fear and confusion. And with music it's sorta similar- I can improvise sometimes and I love the way I'm able to do it. And other times I just mess up and just struggle and freak out again like ahsbsbdhddhdh yeah I'm not perfect at all. But pfft atleast I'm looking at how stupid I am and realizing how stupid I am.

      Yeah bill sorry for being stupid. I vent on here and I look back and I'm like holy shit I was really really fucking stupid. Ha. Ok I'm going to take my advice now and make some art that's kinda stupid but honest if that makes sense. Bye.

8.18.18  9:49 pm   Hey. I've been feeling pretty terribly lately. I'm just really overwhelmed by being human- you know- the fact that you're required to go to school, and expected to go to college and if you don't you're considered a failiure,

      the pressure of my family to dedicate my life to school because they tell me that if I don't, I'm going to be poor. And I'm attempting to be a good artist only to fall on my face. And I try to run away from these terrible feelings through video games and I even fail at that too. So I'm going through a pretty rough time. I don't even know what to do to help myself. But thank god it's nighttime. I can't stand the daytime because I'm surrounded by an environment that I hate and whenever I open my eyes I can see every single inch of it. I guess to comfort myself in these times I just go underneath my blankets and distance myself from the world and type to you. I just really want to feel better but I don't know how. Actually, I'd feel a lot b etter if I knew that I can succeed in the future without college and if I could be comfortable talking to my parents about my feelings. And i had a car so I can just leave my house and distance myself from everything I hate about this world.

     I think that's how I can truly be happy you know- being confident in the future and in yourself. I'm a bit hesitant to go all in and have a whole bunch of confidence that if I get better at art I'll be all set in life. I mean even if I'm wrong, I might as well try, right? It's better than just sitting here extremely afraid and sad. And i feel like I can learn a lot from it all- I mainly think that being good at art would be what makes me joyous and feel fulfilled in life because I love expressing myself. But if I can express myself in a more moving and beautiful way like through music and drawing, I think I'll have a blast. I can express myself in ways that have never been done before. But I have to learn first. I have to get really good and experienced to be able to express myself through song the way I want to.

      So maybe I can type out my feelings in the meantime you know? And still continue to learn the mechanics but still express myself. And then when I get to the point where I'm super confident in my ability, I'll attempt to express my deep feelings through music.

      Music is my main goal. I'm going to listen to some music before going to sleep. Bye.
